live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. A further update will be provided at 08:36 PT. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
59878.summary: Some customers in the South Surrey area of Surrey are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
59878.title: Apr 8 - White Rock & Surrey (South Surrey) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
